summary: Consume CircleCI API to interact with pipelines, including getting, triggering, and listing pipelines.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., pipeline).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., get, getAll, trigger).

parameters.name: vcs
parameters.description: Select the version control system provider (e.g., Bitbucket, GitHub).

parameters.name: projectSlug
parameters.description: Enter the project slug in the format org-name/repo-name.

parameters.name: pipelineNumber
parameters.description: Enter the number of the pipeline to retrieve.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Specify whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Set the maximum number of results to return.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Add filters to narrow down the results (e.g., branch name).

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Add additional fields for triggering a pipeline (e.g., branch, tag).
